Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to a "Campaign Medal for Service" to be awarded to those who have provided military service in Iraq
Summary: Provides for the "Campaign Medal for Service" to be awarded to those who have provided military service in Iraq.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to providing for the "Campaign Medal for Service" to be granted to those who provided military service in Iraq
